sentences.english: Today, I decided to take my dogs out separately.
sentences.chinese: 今天我決定把狗狗一條條地牽出去遛遛。

sentences.english: Today, I decided to take my dogs out separately.
sentences.chinese: 今天我決定把狗狗一條條地牽出去遛遛。

sentences.english: Just then the old woman's cat wanders across the porch in front of them.
sentences.chinese: 這時老太太的貓穿過門廊遛達到他們面前。

sentences.english: We are ready to take a stroll in the village.
We are ready to take a stroll in the village.
He was walking his horse up and down.
sentences.chinese: 是驢子是馬，拉出來遛遛。

sentences.english: He was walking his horse up and down.
sentences.chinese: 是驢子是馬，拉出來遛遛。

sentences.english: It was just an evening walk, Buck thought.
sentences.chinese: 巴克以爲這不過是一次傍晚的遛躂。

sentences.english: Iwill take the dog out for a stroll.
Iwill take the dog out for a stroll.
He proudly promenaded his elegant companion in the park.
sentences.chinese: 他得意地領著他那標緻的伴侶遛公園。

sentences.english: Take the dog for a nice, long walk right after lunch.
sentences.chinese: 午飯後好好帶你的狗遛遛。

sentences.english: Take the dog for a nice, long walk right after lunch.
sentences.chinese: 午飯後好好帶你的狗遛遛。

sentences.english: You should stretch your legs to relax a little.
sentences.chinese: 你應該出去遛遛放鬆一下。

sentences.english: You should stretch your legs to relax a little.

sentences.english: I saw her hacking around the building.
sentences.chinese: 我看見她在那所樓房周圍閒遛。
